languages.text: "Успех частичен. Личность Деменца Ханейманна подтверждена. В когнитивных процессах наблюдается обширное влияние параноидальных мотиваций, которые, видимо, и привели к нарушению обетов. Но обширные блоки памяти повреждены запретными технологиями и пока не поддаются расшифровке".

"The success has been partial. Dementz Haneumann's identity has been confirmed. The widespread influence of paranoid motivations is observable in his cognitive processes, which is what seems to have caused him to break his vows. However, extensive regions of his memory have been damaged by forbidden technologies and are, for now, defying decryption."
languages.original_text: "Успех частичен. Личность Деменца Ханейманна подтверждена. В когнитивных процессах наблюдается обширное влияние параноидальных мотиваций, которые, видимо, и привели к нарушению обетов. Но обширные блоки памяти повреждены запретными технологиями и пока не поддаются расшифровке".

traits.locale_text: "The success has been partial. Dementz Haneumann's identity has been confirmed. An ample influence of paranoid motivations is observable in his cognitive processes, which is what seems to have caused him to break his vows. However, extensive regions of his memory have been damaged by forbidden technologies and are, for now, defying decryption."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “只有一部分发现。我已经确认了德曼兹·哈努曼的身份。通过分析他的认知过程，我察觉到了偏执动机对他产生了重大影响，似乎这便是导致他违背誓言的成因。不过，他记忆中的绝大部分内容已经被禁忌的技术损坏，而且这些内容正在抗拒着我的解密操作。”
languages.original_text: "The success has been partial. Dementz Haneumann's identity has been confirmed. The widespread influence of paranoid motivations is observable in his cognitive processes, which is what seems to have caused him to break his vows. However, extensive regions of his memory have been damaged by forbidden technologies and are, for now, defying decryption."

traits.locale_text: “只有一部分发现。我已经确认了德曼兹·哈努曼的身份。通过分析他的认知过程，我察觉到了偏执动机对他产生了重大影响，似乎这便是导致他违背誓言的成因。不过，他记忆中的绝大部分内容已经被禁忌的技术损坏，而且这些内容正在抗拒着我的解密操作。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «El éxito es solo parcial. He confirmado la identidad de Dementz Haneumann. La extensa influencia de sus motivos paranoicos es visible en sus procesos cognitivos y parece ser la causa de la ruptura de sus juramentos. Sin embargo, regiones extensas de su memoria han resultado dañadas por tecnologías prohibidas y por el momento se resisten a la desencriptación».
languages.original_text: "The success has been partial. Dementz Haneumann's identity has been confirmed. The widespread influence of paranoid motivations is observable in his cognitive processes, which is what seems to have caused him to break his vows. However, extensive regions of his memory have been damaged by forbidden technologies and are, for now, defying decryption."

traits.locale_text: «El éxito es solo parcial. He confirmado la identidad de Dementz Haneumann. La extensa influencia de sus motivos paranoicos es visible en sus procesos cognitivos y parece ser la causa de la ruptura de sus juramentos. Sin embargo, regiones extensas de su memoria han resultado dañadas por tecnologías prohibidas y por el momento se resisten a la desencriptación».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「成功は部分的なものだった。デメンツ・へニュマンのアイデンティティが確認された。彼の認知プロセスには偏執的な動機の影響が広く観察され、それが彼が誓いを破った原因と思われる。しかし、彼の記憶の広範な領域は、禁じられた技術によって損傷されており、今のところ解読は不可能となっている」
languages.original_text: "The success has been partial. Dementz Haneumann's identity has been confirmed. The widespread influence of paranoid motivations is observable in his cognitive processes, which is what seems to have caused him to break his vows. However, extensive regions of his memory have been damaged by forbidden technologies and are, for now, defying decryption."

traits.locale_text: 「成功は部分的なものだった。デメンツ・へニュマンのアイデンティティが確認された。彼の認知プロセスには偏執的な動機の影響が広く観察され、それが彼が誓いを破った原因と思われる。しかし、彼の記憶の広範な領域は、禁じられた技術によって損傷されており、今のところ解読は不可能となっている」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Es war ein Teilerfolg. Die Identität von Dementz Haneumann wurde bestätigt. In seinen kognitiven Prozessen ist ein umfangreicher Einfluss paranoider Beweggründe zu erkennen, was wohl der Auslöser dafür war, dass er seinen Eid gebrochen hat. Weite Teile seines Speichers wurden jedoch durch verbotene Technologien beschädigt und widersetzen sich bisher der Entschlüsselung."
languages.original_text: "The success has been partial. Dementz Haneumann's identity has been confirmed. The widespread influence of paranoid motivations is observable in his cognitive processes, which is what seems to have caused him to break his vows. However, extensive regions of his memory have been damaged by forbidden technologies and are, for now, defying decryption."

traits.locale_text: "Es war ein Teilerfolg. Die Identität von Dementz Haneumann wurde bestätigt. In seinen kognitiven Prozessen ist ein umfangreicher Einfluss paranoider Beweggründe zu erkennen, was wohl der Auslöser dafür war, dass er seinen Eid gebrochen hat. Weite Teile seines Speichers wurden jedoch durch verbotene Technologien beschädigt und widersetzen sich bisher der Entschlüsselung."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « L'opération s'est révélée partiellement concluante. L'identité de Dementz Haneumann a été confirmée. On peut observer l'influence généralisée de motivations paranoïaques dans ses processus cognitifs, ce qui semble l'avoir poussé à briser son serment. Cela dit, d'importantes zones de sa mémoire ont été endommagées par des technologies interdites et sont pour le moment impossibles à déchiffrer. »
languages.original_text: "The success has been partial. Dementz Haneumann's identity has been confirmed. The widespread influence of paranoid motivations is observable in his cognitive processes, which is what seems to have caused him to break his vows. However, extensive regions of his memory have been damaged by forbidden technologies and are, for now, defying decryption."

traits.locale_text: « L'opération s'est révélée partiellement concluante. L'identité de Dementz Haneumann a été confirmée. On peut observer l'influence généralisée de motivations paranoïaques dans ses processus cognitifs, ce qui semble l'avoir poussé à briser son serment. Cela dit, d'importantes zones de sa mémoire ont été endommagées par des technologies interdites et sont pour le moment impossibles à déchiffrer. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "The success has been partial. Dementz Haneumann's identity has been confirmed. The widespread influence of paranoid motivations is observable in his cognitive processes, which is what seems to have caused him to break his vows. However, extensive regions of his memory have been damaged by forbidden technologies and are, for now, defying decryption."

languages.text: "Kısmi bir başarı söz konusu. Dementz Haneumann'ın kimliği doğrulandı. Zihinsel işlevlerinde paranoyak motivasyonların etkisinin büyük olduğu gözlemlendi. Yemininden dönmesine de bu sebep olmuş gibi görünüyor. Belleğinin geniş bir bölümü, yasaklı teknolojiler nedeniyle hasar görmüş. Şimdilik deşifre edilmeyi kabul etmiyor."
languages.original_text: "The success has been partial. Dementz Haneumann's identity has been confirmed. The widespread influence of paranoid motivations is observable in his cognitive processes, which is what seems to have caused him to break his vows. However, extensive regions of his memory have been damaged by forbidden technologies and are, for now, defying decryption."

traits.locale_text: "Kısmi bir başarı söz konusu. Dementz Haneumann'ın kimliği onaylandı. Zihinsel işlevlerinde paranoyak motivasyonların geniş etkisinin bulunduğu gözlemlendi, ki yemininden dönmesine sebep olan da bu gibi görünüyor. Belleğinin geniş bir bölümü yasaklı teknolojiler nedeniyle hasar görmüş ve çözülmeyi şimdilik kabul etmiyor ama."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
